thread.title: Win 2016 Ryder Cup tickets

author: The Telegraph
title: Win 2016 Ryder Cup tickets
text: Read more about the business of sport Next year Europe, under captain Darren Clarke, from Northern Ireland, will be trying to make it four wins on the trot – and their eighth triumph in the past nine matches – at Hazeltine National Golf Club in Chaska, Minnesota. But the United States, still smarting from their 16½-11½ defeat last year at Gleneagles, will be hoping that the two-time major winner from Texas, Jordan Spieth, can inspire them to their first victory since 2008 at the Valhalla Golf Club in Kentucky. It will be another huge occasion – and you could be there to watch it all, thanks to Standard Life Investments, Worldwide Partner of the Ryder Cup. One lucky Telegraph reader will win a pair of general admission tickets to the 2016 Ryder Cup, which takes place from 30 September to 2 October, 2016. Departure is from London on 29 September, returning on 3 October, 2016. The prize comprises: • Two general admission tickets to the 2016 Ryder Cup, valid for all three days of the competition • Two return economy class flights from London to Minneapolis-St Paul • Accommodation for four nights at the Hilton Bloomington, based on two people sharing a twin or double room • Return coach transfers to Hazeltine National Golf Club Perfect match This fantastic prize comes from the leading global asset management company Standard Life Investments. It signed a four-year worldwide partnership with The Ryder Cup in 2013 – a perfect match for its heritage, client base and team ethos. Standard Life Investments is working closely with the PGA of America and Ryder Cup Europe to ensure Hazeltine 2016 is a tremendous success. Online Form - Win 2016 Ryder Cup tickets
